name: Let Your Curse Be On Me
name_original: Let Your Curse Be On Me
description:
"Let Your Curse Be On Me" is an interactive piece of fanfiction for the 2019 Unconventional Fanworks Exchange. It is designed to be read by players unfamiliar with its original canon (Square-Enix's 1998 RPG Final Fantasy Tactics), although knowing the game that inspired it will certainly make some elements of narrative foreshadowing clearer. 

The Archive of Our Own page--which contains additional information for those unfamiliar with the canon--may be found here. Comments are welcome on either Ao3 or itch.io, although I am more likely to see and respond to them promptly on Ao3.
